General.Name: Jiangsu Guotai International Group Guomao Co Ltd
General.Description: Jiangsu Guotai International Group Co., Ltd. engages in the import and export of consumer goods. The company offers textiles, clothing, toys, etc. It also engages in the research and development, and production of lithium-ion battery electrolyte and silane coupling agent; real estate; and financial investment businesses. The company was formerly known as Jiangsu Guotai International Group Guomao Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Jiangsu Guotai International Group Co., Ltd. in May 2019. Jiangsu Guotai International Group Co., Ltd. was founded in 1997 and is headquartered in Zhangjiagang, China.
